statements: SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_date, agenda_text FROM meetings;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT agenda_text, minutes_text FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT meeting_date, minutes_text FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM meetings ORDER BY agenda_text ASC, meeting_date DESC
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, minutes_text FROM meetings WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT agenda_text, minutes_text FROM meetings WHERE agenda_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY meeting_date
SELECT * FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM meeting_agendas ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT agenda_id, meeting_topic FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_topic IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM meeting_minutes WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT meeting_id, attendee_name FROM meeting_minutes ORDER BY minutes_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_agendas WHERE agenda_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND meeting_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT agenda_id, meeting_topic FROM meeting_agendas ORDER BY meeting_topic DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_minutes WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT meeting_minutes.meeting_id, meeting_agendas.meeting_title, COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM meeting_minutes JOIN meeting_agendas ON meeting_minutes.meeting_id = meeting_agendas.agenda_id GROUP BY meeting_minutes.meeting_id ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_name = 'Alice';
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT agenda_id, agenda_item FROM meeting_agendas WHERE agenda_item LIKE '%discussion%';
SELECT * FROM meeting_minutes ORDER BY minute_details ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY member_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_id FROM meeting_agendas WHERE agenda_item ILIKE '%budget%' ORDER BY agenda_id DESC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members JOIN meeting_minutes ON team_members.member_id = meeting_minutes.member_id WHERE minute_details LIKE '%high priority%' ORDER BY member_name, email ASC;
SELECT agenda_id, meeting_id FROM meeting_agendas WHERE agenda_item ILIKE '%project%' OR agenda_item ILIKE '%task%' ORDER BY agenda_id ASC, meeting_id DESC;
SELECT MIN(LENGTH(agenda_item)) AS shortest_agenda_length FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_id = 'ab8f6e04-5190-4893-a4db-7a59e40f7ad0';
SELECT * FROM MeetingAgendas;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM MeetingAgendas ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM MeetingMinutes WHERE meeting_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE role LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT meeting_id, reminder_date, reminder_description FROM MeetingReminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-09-01'
SELECT * FROM MeetingAgendas;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM MeetingAgendas ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM MeetingMinutes WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date, m.attendee_name, m.attendance_status FROM MeetingAgendas a JOIN MeetingMinutes m ON a.meeting_id = m.meeting_id WHERE a.meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.attendee_name, r.reminder_date, r.reminder_description FROM MeetingAttendees m LEFT JOIN MeetingReminders r ON m.attendee_id = r.reminder_id;
SELECT * FROM meeting_agendas;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_topic FROM meeting_agendas;
SELECT id, meeting_topic, agenda_items FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE is_present = true;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM meeting_participants WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM meeting_agendas ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE is_present = TRUE AND meeting_id = 5;
SELECT participant_name, email, role FROM meeting_participants WHERE role = 'Chairperson';
SELECT * FROM action_items WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01' AND is_completed = FALSE ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT meeting_topic, agenda_items FROM meeting_agendas WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
